name: Evonik - Skin Microbiome Solutions
description: Evonik applies decades of microbiome science from health and animal nutrition to advanced skincare applications. Their Skin Microbiome platform utilizes sophisticated skin microbiota models to develop innovative actives that support skin health through microbiome balance. Backed by deep scientific expertise and research capabilities.
notes: Evonik brings deep scientific expertise from health and animal nutrition microbiome applications to cosmetics. Advanced skin microbiota models enable sophisticated ingredient development. Part of Beauty Excellence platform demonstrating commitment to innovation.
